alert.note: Alert for Brooks (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 1:48PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Brooks County through 230 PM CDT... At 145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Encino, moving north at 10 mph. Other strong thunderstorms were along highway 281 from Encino to Falfurrias. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Falfurrias, Encino, Rachal, La Colonia Park, Airport Road Addition, Falfurrias Junior High School, Pleasant Park, El Coyote Ranch Airport, Falfurrias Fire Station and Cantu Addition. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
